name: 2Color Space
description:
Made in <48 Hours for a 2-Color Game  Jam!

Mouse1 Fires

Mouse2 Boosts

Space Brakes

W/S Tilt 

A/D Spin

Q/E Turn

The controls are bit strange but the biggest challenge was trying to figure out how to convey information about a 3D environment in only two colors!

A pretty simple game overall but still quite enjoyable to throw together. 

The bullets do register damage on the "enemy ships" and they WILL shoot at you if you get close enough! The enemy ships DO take damage and will explode/vanish upon being killed. A score counter could be easy to add in the future perhaps...

There is a known bug right now in that the starting ships aggro onto each other once they start firing and then ignore the player! This sort of breaks the game but for now, I'll leave it in because it's kind of fun to zoom around and try and take them out while they shoot at each other...
